column4: please, somebody... zend studio, when i start it it`s all gray. someone knows anything about it?
thats was a compiz-bug some year ago
try open a terminal and type "metacity --replace"
please send me your address... i`m gonna send u a case of beer man!!!
but anyway, tried eclipse with the php-plugins, i like it more then zend
yeah i tried it also but zend is much more for my taste :)
you will have to disable 3d-effects every time you want to run zend tho
also i used zend for almost 2 years now... so i`m kinda use to it :)
or maybe there are some compiz-patch for that if you are in the mood for fixing it.
there`s some zend plugin for eclipse in beta available on zend.com. u tried it?
